languages.text: "С тех пор, как каждый шаг превратился в пытку, я стал очень осторожен с выбором путей". {n}Винтерскейл улыбается по-прежнему дерзко, но уже беззлобно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "С тех пор, как каждый шаг превратился в пытку, я стал очень осторожен с выбором путей". {n}Винтерскейл улыбается по-прежнему дерзко, но уже беззлобно.{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Now that a single step brings excruciating pain, I am being very cautious about the paths I choose." {n}Brazenness still colours the contours of Winterscale's smile, but the spite has vanished.{/n}
languages.original_text: "С тех пор, как каждый шаг превратился в пытку, я стал очень осторожен с выбором путей". {n}Винтерскейл улыбается по-прежнему дерзко, но уже беззлобно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ever since my every step has become excruciatingly painful, I have been very cautious about the paths I choose." {n}Winterscale's smile is still as brazen, but the spite is gone from it.{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Ever since my every step has become excruciatingly painful, I have been very cautious about the paths I choose." {n}Winterscale's smile is still as brazen, but the spite is gone from it.{/n}

traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Ever since even a single step has brought excruciating pain, I have been very cautious about the paths I choose." {n}Brazenness still colours the contours of Winterscale's smile, but the spite has vanished.{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Now that a single step brings excruciating pain, I am being very cautious about the paths I choose." {n}Brazenness still colours the contours of Winterscale's smile, but the spite has vanished.{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Now that a single step brings excruciating pain, I am being very cautious about the paths I choose." {n}Brazenness still colours the contours of Winterscale's smile, but the spite has vanished.{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: «Ahora que dar el más mínimo paso me causa un dolor atroz, soy muy cauteloso a la hora de escoger mi camino». {n}Aún queda un deje de descaro en el contorno de la sonrisa de Winterscale, pero el rencor se ha desvanecido.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now that a single step brings excruciating pain, I am being very cautious about the paths I choose." {n}Brazenness still colours the contours of Winterscale's smile, but the spite has vanished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Desde que dar el más mínimo paso me causa un dolor atroz, he sido muy cauteloso a la hora de escoger mi camino». {n}Aún queda un deje de descaro en el contorno de la sonrisa de Winterscale, pero el rencor se ha desvanecido.{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: “现在每走一小步都能让我疼得要命，所以我确实得谨慎选择接下来的每一步。”{n}温特斯凯尔的笑容仍然与以前一样大大咧咧，但恶毒之意已经消失不见。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now that a single step brings excruciating pain, I am being very cautious about the paths I choose." {n}Brazenness still colours the contours of Winterscale's smile, but the spite has vanished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是啊，每走一小步都让我疼得要命，所以我确实得谨慎选择接下来的每一步。”{n}温特斯凯尔的笑容仍然与以前一样厚颜无耻，但恶毒之意已经消失不见。{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: « Depuis que le moindre pas me fait souffrir le martyre, je fais très attention aux voies que j'emprunte. » {n}Si le sourire de Winterscale affiche encore une certaine effronterie, son mépris a disparu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now that a single step brings excruciating pain, I am being very cautious about the paths I choose." {n}Brazenness still colours the contours of Winterscale's smile, but the spite has vanished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Depuis que le moindre pas me fait souffrir le martyre, je fais très attention aux voies que j'emprunte. » {n}Si le sourire de Winterscale affiche encore une certaine effronterie, son mépris a disparu.{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: 「一歩踏み出すだけでも耐え難い痛みを伴うようになって以来、自分の選ぶ道には慎重になったもんさ」{n}ウィンタースケールの笑みは未だ厚かましさに彩られて入るものの、憎らしさは消えていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now that a single step brings excruciating pain, I am being very cautious about the paths I choose." {n}Brazenness still colours the contours of Winterscale's smile, but the spite has vanished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「一歩踏み出すだけでも耐え難い痛みを伴うようになって以来、自分の選ぶ道には慎重になったもんさ」{n}ウィンタースケールの笑みは未だ厚かましさに彩られて入るものの、憎らしさは消えていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Nun, da jeder einzelne Schritt quälende Schmerzen mit sich bringt, bin ich sehr vorsichtig, welche Pfade ich wähle." {n}Verwegenheit färbt noch immer die Konturen von Winterzunders Lächeln, doch der Spott ist verschwunden.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now that a single step brings excruciating pain, I am being very cautious about the paths I choose." {n}Brazenness still colours the contours of Winterscale's smile, but the spite has vanished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seit jeder einzelne Schritt quälende Schmerzen mit sich bringt, bin ich sehr vorsichtig, welche Pfade ich wähle." {n}Verwegenheit färbt noch immer die Konturen von Winterzunders Lächeln, doch der Spott ist verschwunden.{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Attığım tek bir adım bile beni acıdan kıvrandırıyor, seçtiğim yollar konusunda dikkatli olacağıma emin olabilirsin." {n}Winterscale'in gülüşünde hâlâ bir arsızlık olmakla birlikte kininden iz kalmamış.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now that a single step brings excruciating pain, I am being very cautious about the paths I choose." {n}Brazenness still colours the contours of Winterscale's smile, but the spite has vanished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Attığım tek bir adım bile beni acıdan kıvrandırıyor, seçtiğim yollar konusunda dikkatli olacağıma emin olabilirsin." {n}Winterscale'in gülüşünde hâlâ bir arsızlık var ama kininden iz kalmamış.{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion
